ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: About what are they asking one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: OF WHAT ARE they asking one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: About what are they asking one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What are they questioning each other about?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Of what do they ask one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Of what do they question one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Whereof do they question one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What are they asking each other about?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: What is it that they are questioning each other about?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What do they question each other about!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: What are they asking one another about?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: About what are they asking one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:1] About what, about what thing, are they, the people of Quraysh, questioning one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (Whereof do they question one another?): He says: 'what are they-meaning the people of Quraysh- talking about?'
